reg:regulation.reg:title: Regional District Requisition Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 118/2018, June 15, 2018]

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Local Government Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Regional district officer certification of annual requisition to Surveyor of Taxes

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 387 of the Act, in addition to the certification required under subsection (1) (b) (i) [amount requisitioned is included in financial plan] of that section, the designated regional district officer must certify the following in relation to each service for which an amount is requisitioned under that section:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: that the service was, as applicable,

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: provided under an establishing bylaw that has not been repealed, or

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: if applicable, that the service is identified with an accurate code provided by the British Columbia Assessment Authority;
that the amount requisitioned does not exceed the maximum amount that is authorized to be requisitioned for that service

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: under the establishing bylaw or other legal authority, or

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: that the amount requisitioned is apportioned, as applicable,

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: in accordance with the establishing bylaw or other legal authority, or

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: that the property tax imposed through the requisition process is authorized through the establishing bylaw or other legal authority.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A certification under section 387 of the Act must be made in a form established by the Surveyor of Taxes.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Local Government Act, R.S.B.C. 2015, c. 1, s. 387 (2)]
